name: UpDownCubi
description:
This game was made for The Farewell North - Community Jam 2

I had a lot of things to do on that week, so this game was actually made in less than 2 days.

It's playable in the browser, but I advise you to download it for the best experience.

 I hope you like it.

What's Farewell North? It's an indie game about restoring color to the world, and it's a promising upcoming game that you should check and wishlist it on steam link :  

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432850/Farewell_North/?utm_source=discord&ut...
